attributes.action: The public must own a licence to own certain dog breeds.
attributes.additional_details: I want to have licencing come into effect because deaths are on the rise, many of them children, I don't want to see a breed be banned because there are  irresponsible owners but I would like the Government to recognise and take the opportunity to education the public rather than creating fear for certain breeds.
attributes.background: I would like an enforcement of the public to have a licence to own certain dog breeds. Dog attacks are on the rise year after year and the breed is not the problem but bad owners, to obtain a licence you must prove you are capable of handling such breeds.

rejection.details:
We understand you want people to be required to hold a licence if they wish to own 'certain dog breeds', however it's not clear which breeds you want this to apply to.

You could have a petition calling for owners to be required to obtain a licence in order to own specific dog breeds, so long as it was clear which breeds these were.
